describe: The Czech Republic, located in Central Europe, is known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. It is a landlocked country bordered by Germany, Austria, Slovakia, and Poland. The Czech Republic boasts a diverse landscape of mountains, forests, and charming towns.

cities.name: 🏔 Prague
cities.geographical_location: Located in the central-western part of the country along the Vltava River.
cities.climate: Prague has an oceanic climate with warm summers and chilly, damp winters.

cities.name: 🏰 Brno
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the southeastern part of the country in the region of Moravia.
cities.climate: Brno experiences a temperate continental climate with hot summers and cold winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Moravian wine, Zelňačka (cabbage soup), and Vepřo knedlo zelo.
popular_attractions: Cathedral of St. Peter and Paul

cities.name: 🏰 Český Krumlov
cities.geographical_location: Located in the South Bohemian Region, near the Vltava River.
cities.climate: Český Krumlov has a humid continental climate with warm summers and cold, snowy winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Roast pork with dumplings and sauerkraut, and Krumlovské koláče.
